presentationColumns.name: Expense Reports Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows count of distinct Expense reports.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - EXM Employee Expenses.Expense Reports Count

presentationColumns.name: Expense Lines Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows count of distinct Expense report lines.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - EXM Employee Expenses.Expense Lines Count

presentationColumns.name: Expense Distribution Count
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows count of distinct Expense report distributions.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - EXM Employee Expenses.Expense Distribution Count

presentationColumns.name: Expense Approval Cycle Time (Days)
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as follows: Total Approval Days/ Expense Distribution Count where Total Approval days is the number of days between Expense Report Final approval date and Submission date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - EXM Employee Expenses.Expense Approval Cycle Time (Days)

presentationColumns.name: Expense Filing Cycle Time (Days)
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as follows: Total Filing Days/ Expense Distribution Count where Total Filing days is the number of days between Expense Report Submission date and Creation date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - EXM Employee Expenses.Expense Filing Cycle Time (Days)

presentationColumns.name: Cash Expense Reimbursement Cycle Time (Days)
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as follows: Total Cash Expense Days/ Expense Distribution Count where Total Cash Expense days is the number of days between Cash Expense Paid date and Submission date
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - EXM Employee Expenses.Cash Expense Reimbursement Cycle Time (Days)

presentationColumns.name: Manual Audit Percentage
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows the percentage of expense reports with Audit type not equal to Automatic Approval
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - EXM Employee Expenses.Manual Audit Percentage

presentationColumns.name: Auto Audit Percentage
presentationColumns.description: This metric shows the percentage of expense reports with Audit type equal to Automatic Approval
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - EXM Employee Expenses.Auto Audit Percentage

presentationColumns.name: Average Days Late
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as follows: Days Late/ Expense Reports Count where Days Late is the number of days between Expense Report Submission date and Transaction date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - EXM Employee Expenses.Average Days Late
